**What To Validate**

- [ ] leading spaces and <valid input> --> Does X
- [ ] trailing spaces and <valid input> --> Does X

- [ ] <invalid input 2 > --> Does X
- [ ] nothing as input --> Does X
- [ ] spaces as input  --> Does X
- [ ] <valid input 1> --> Does X
- [ ] <valid input 2> --> Does X
